local BeamInfo = TweenInfo.new(0.5)
local Tool = script.Parent Tool.RequiresHandle = false local Handle = Tool.Handle Handle.Name = "Right Gaunlet"
local Remotes = Tool.Remotes local ClientControls = Remotes.ClientControls local ServerControls = Remotes.ServerControls
local BASE_GAUNLET = Handle:Clone() Handle:Destroy()
local Player = nil local Character = nil local Humanoid = nil local LeftGaunlet = nil local RightGaunlet = nil
local ToolEquipped = false
local RELOAD_TIME = 1 local MAX_LENGTH = 5000 local DAMAGE = 30
local LeftOrRight = 0
local BEAM_COLOR = Color3.fromRGB(98, 239, 243)
local Animations = { R15LeftFire = {Animation = Tool.Animations.R15.LeftFire}, R15RightFire = {Animation = Tool.Animations.R15.RightFire},
LeftFire = {Animation = Tool.Animations.R6.LeftFire}, RightFire = {Animation = Tool.Animations.R6.RightFire} }
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local Results = nil
pcall(function() Results = ClientControls:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end)
return Results end
function RayCast(Start, Direction, Length) local NewRay = Ray.new(Start, Direction * Length)
return workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(NewRay, {Character}) end
function FireBeam(Start, Endpoint) local NewPart = Instance.new("Part") NewPart.Material = Enum.Material.Neon NewPart.Color = BEAM_COLOR local Distance = (Start - Endpoint).Magnitude NewPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, Distance) NewPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(Start, Endpoint) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -Distance * 0.5) NewPart.Anchored = true NewPart.CanCollide = false NewPart.Parent = workspace
local FadeAwayTween = TweenService:Create(NewPart, BeamInfo, {Transparency = 1}) FadeAwayTween:Play()
pcall(function() Debris:AddItem(NewPart, 1) end)
return NewPart end
function CheckIfAlive() return Player and Character and Humanoid and Humanoid.RootPart and Humanoid.Health > 0 end
function WeldToAttachment(Attach1, Attach2) if not Attach1 or not Attach2 then return end
local Motor = Instance.new("Motor6D") Motor.Part0 = Attach1.Parent Motor.Part1 = Attach2.Parent Motor.C0 = Attach1.CFrame Motor.C1 = Attach2.CFrame
Motor.Parent = Attach1.Parent
return Motor end
Tool.Activated:Connect(function() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or not RightGaunlet then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
LeftOrRight = (LeftOrRight + 1) % 2
local BeamAttachment = RightGaunlet:FindFirstChild("BeamAttachment") local BeamPosition = RightGaunlet.CFrame.p local Animation = Animations.RightFire if LeftOrRight == 0 then -- left BeamAttachment = LeftGaunlet and LeftGaunlet:FindFirstChild("BeamAttachment") if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15LeftFire else Animation = Animations.LeftFire end else -- right if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15RightFire end end
InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) wait(0.1) if BeamAttachment then BeamPosition = BeamAttachment.WorldPosition else BeamPosition = RightGaunlet.CFrame.p end
local MouseData = InvokeClient("GetMouseData") if MouseData then local Hit, Endpoint = RayCast(Humanoid.RootPart.CFrame.p, CFrame.new(Humanoid.RootPart.CFrame.p, MouseData.Position).lookVector, MAX_LENGTH) FireBeam(BeamPosition, Endpoint) if Hit then local ParentTo = Hit.Parent if ParentTo then if ParentTo:IsA("Accessory") or ParentTo:IsA("Tool") then ParentTo = ParentTo.Parent end
local HitHumanoid = ParentTo:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if HitHumanoid then HitHumanoid:TakeDamage(DAMAGE) end end end
wait(RELOAD_TIME) end Tool.Enabled = true end)
Tool.Equipped:Connect(function() if ToolEquipped then return end
ToolEquipped = true
Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local LeftHand = Character:FindFirstChild("LeftHand") or Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local RightHand = Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand") or Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm")
if LeftHand then LeftGaunlet = BASE_GAUNLET:Clone() LeftGaunlet.Name = "Left Gaunlet" LeftGaunlet.Parent = Tool local GripAttachment = LeftGaunlet:FindFirstChild("RightGripAttachment") if GripAttachment then GripAttachment.Name = "LeftGripAttachment" end
WeldToAttachment(GripAttachment, LeftHand:FindFirstChild("LeftGripAttachment")) end
if RightHand then RightGaunlet = BASE_GAUNLET:Clone() RightGaunlet.Parent = Tool local GripAttachment = RightGaunlet:FindFirstChild("RightGripAttachment")
WeldToAttachment(GripAttachment, RightHand:FindFirstChild("RightGripAttachment")) end end)
Tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() if not ToolEquipped then return end
ToolEquipped = false Character = nil Player = nil Humanoid = nil
if LeftGaunlet then LeftGaunlet:Destroy() end
if RightGaunlet then RightGaunlet:Destroy() end
RightGaunlet = nil LeftGaunlet = nil end)
